doc.name: Slice
doc.description: Produce an output token on each firing with a FixPoint value that is equal to the slicing of the bits of the input token value. The bit width of the output token value is determined by taking the difference of parameters start and end. The width parameter specifies the bit width of the input value. The output FixPoint value is unsigned, and all its bits are integer bits. The input can have any scalar type.
doc.author: Man-Kit Leung
doc.property: The start index for the portion of the bits to be sliced.
The end index for the portion of the bits to be sliced.
Whether start and end index assumes LSB or MSB representation.
